competitors.name: Hewlett-Packard
competitors.notes: Major competitor in hardware, servers, and IT infrastructure post-IBM PC division sale

competitors.name: Dell
competitors.notes: Leading PC and server manufacturer, competitor in enterprise hardware

competitors.name: Accenture
competitors.notes: Major competitor in IT consulting; IBM acquired PwC's consulting arm in 2002 to compete

competitors.name: EDS (Electronic Data Systems)
competitors.notes: Competitor in IT services and outsourcing

competitors.name: Infosys
competitors.notes: Indian company providing business consultancy and IT services

competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Competitor in enterprise software and emerging services

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Competitor in enterprise software, databases, and middleware

competitors.name: Sun Microsystems
competitors.notes: Competitor in servers and enterprise systems

context: International Business Machines Corporation is a technology and consulting company focused on hybrid cloud, AI, enterprise software, and consulting. Sold PC business to Lenovo. Services and software focus.
